content: hey crafting friends had a little news about my patreon I'm going to stop doing
the crafters layer well yes sense i'm going to stop doing just a monthly
magazine and I want to start doing weekly little videos instead of just one
monthly video just cuz I have so many ideas I just want to get them out there
and a lot of these videos aren't necessarily long enough for a whole
video but i want to share these with my friends so I want to do start doing
weekly videos for my patreon friends and if you're not a patreon member please
consider joining the patreon if you watch my vids which over there's over
500 if you watch them and you're getting a lot of stuff for your game or you know
I'm giving you some good information you know consider consider joining it helps
support the community help support this channel allows me to buy more materials
experiment more upgrade my equipment I'm sure you guys have seen the improvement
in my videos from my upgraded equipment so I just want to say I really
appreciate you guys helping out you know we have I have such members as dmg why
lock dungeons and glue sticks are all in that group to support the dm's craft
because they understand how important it is to keep this community going and
spread the love of crafting we just love this crafting so much we want to spread
it and we want to make it inclusive for everyone this is something that everyone
can do and I really want to keep it that way and your support just really helps
me do that to just reach more and more people so I really appreciate it and I
just wanted to give you a little info about the crafters layer and take care
guys go forth and crafts and have fun
